content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate smelting area at position (x=0, y=0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (x=4.0, y=0.0)
- Furnace at position (x=2.0, y=0.0)
- Furnace at position (x=6.0, y=0.0)

### Coal extraction area at position (x=40.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Coal mining drill (exact position not specified)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory management
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into furnaces. For example, you received errors indicating "No iron-ore to insert from your inventory" and "No coal to insert from your inventory." Always check your inventory before performing insert operations.

### Errors when inserting into furnaces that are full
- Avoid attempting to insert items into furnaces that are already full. You received errors indicating "Failed to insert coal into stone-furnace... Inventory is full." Monitor the fuel and output inventories of your furnaces to prevent this issue.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
